All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
public class ServiceProxyGeneratorMojo
extends UPnPGeneratorMojo

This plugin generates a java proxy from a Service Control Protocol Description. The proxy is based on the OSGi UPnP base driver specification

Author:
vega
